channel.title: Server Error Help *FIXED*
channel.description:
Hey, When I start my server I get this but I get nothing when I compile
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "i tem " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:313) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:30)[/code]
Any help greatly appreciated.
Fixed: Replaced item.cfg with original

item.title: Server Error Help *FIXED*
item.dc:creator: @GuNtRiX GuNtRiX
item.description:
@GuNtRiX wrote:

Hey,
When I start my server I get this but I get nothing when I compile

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "i tem " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:313) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:30)

Any help greatly appreciated.

Fixed:
